ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Just wanted to say Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: You ve got to be kidding. ... From: phil454  To: ;  Sent: Monday, March 19, 2001
ygData.messageBody:
You've got to be kidding.
----- Original Message -----

Sent: Monday, March 19, 2001 5:31 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_women] Just wanted to say Hello

> > Hi !I subscribe today to this mailing list and wanted to say "Hello"

> Coco Avignon wrote:
>
> Hi !I subscribe today to this mailing list and wanted to say "Hello" to
all others.I am playing Everquest since November 1999 and really love it. My
husband is playing to on a seperate PC.My favorite character is a druid,
named "Bandyleg Whompyknobber" and my alt char is a Monk with the name
"Yuanshih". Both on the Solusek Ro server.In RL i come from Austria in
Europe, so you have to look over the Z and Y i am changing. Cause the game
doesnt support a german keyboard, and now i am so used to switching thos two
letters, that i have problems in E-Mails :-))GreetingsRita
>
